# Tools required ⚙️

You will need some important hardware and software tools to take on the forthcoming challenges. Let us get familiarize with them.


## Hardware tools 🛠️

These are the physical tools required for experimentation.

- **Main components**
  - Arduino Uno (x1)
  - Breadboard  (x1)
  - Connecting wires (more than 20)
  - Battery holder (x1)
  - AA Batteries (x2)

- **Input/Sensors**
  - Push button

- **Output/Actuator**
  - Red LED

- **Misc.**
  - PC/Laptop
  - USB Type-A to USB Type-B cable
  - Resistors (320 Ω)
 

## Software tools 🖥️

- Arduino IDE
